thread.title: Disturbing clip shows carer 'performing lewd acts' on elderly man, 100, who has been diagnosed with dementia
thread.title_full: Disturbing clip shows carer 'performing lewd acts' on elderly man, 100, who has been diagnosed with dementia - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Disturbing clip shows carer 'performing lewd acts' on elderly man, 100, who has been diagnosed with dementia
text:
Disturbing clip shows carer 'performing lewd acts' on elderly man, 100, who has been diagnosed with dementia The woman flashed her bottom at the man as well as straddling his leg and touching him and asking: "I'm a girl, you know what that means?" Share By Kara O'Neill 10:19, 22 FEB 2017 Updated 10:23, 22 this video again Video will play in Caregiver performs lewd acts on a 100-year-old man Share this video Watch Next Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email Disturbing footage has emerged showing a care giver allegedly performing lewd acts on a 100-year-old man diagnosed with dementia .
The shocking video appears to show 26-year-old Brittany Fultz, who works in a care home in Sandusky, Ohio, showing her bottom to the man, as well as straddling his legs.
She is also heard saying: "I can show you new things, I can show you new things.
"I'm a girl, you know what that means?"
The elderly man asks: "What does that mean?"
The woman bends over and shows off her bottom to the elderly man (Photo: Fox 6) Fultz told the elderly man that she could 'show him things' (Photo: Fox 6) It has been reported that the footage was filmed by Fultz's colleague who also worked at the same care facility and was in the room at the time of the incident.
According to police , Fultz now faces charges of gross sexual imposition.
It's possible she could face additional charges too.
Sandusky Detective Anthony Bath told Fox6 News : "She is basically harassing him.
The care home in Sandusky, Ohio, where the incident is said to have taken place (Photo: Google) Read More Grandparents save parents almost Â£2,000 in childcare costs each year "It's disturbing. She is touching him. This was not something he wanted.
The video was allegedly filmed several months ago but has only recently been handed to officials.
Management at the care home could not be reached.
Fultz has been bailed and is due in court soon, according to reports.
